close_oven.88925: Close the door to the oven

pour_orange_cup_onto_tray.94630: Pour the contents of the orange cup onto the oven tray

pour_orange_cup_onto_black_tray.13884: Pour the content of the orange cup onto the black tray

pour_blue_cup_onto_plate.4520: Pour the contents of the blue cup onto the plate
